title: The Gary Null Show
content: Nature as it was, as it is now and as it can be, and how we can reclaim our loss of memory of nature’s splendor and... <!--more--> wildness JB MacKinnon is one of Canada’s most popular authors and script writers on the environment and ecology and a leader in local food movements.  He is a past editor of Adbusters, the magazine that launched the Occupy Wall Street movement, and was a senior contributing editor for Explore, Canada’s national outdoors publication.  JB has received over a dozen national and international awards for his essays and science writing.
